executable.title: Encode DICOM Parametric Map
executable.description: Convert a parametric map provided in any of the formats supported by ITK, such as NRRD or NIFTI, as a DICOM Parametric Map image object.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is supported in part the National Institutes of Health, National Cancer Institute, Informatics Technology for Cancer Research (ITCR) program, grant Quantitative Image Informatics for Cancer Research (QIICR) (U24 CA180918, PIs Kikinis and Fedorov).

file.name: inputFileName
file.label: Parametric Map file name
file.description: File name of the parametric map image in a format readable by ITK (NRRD, NIfTI, MHD, etc.).

file.name: dicomImageFileName
file.label: DICOM images file name
file.description: File name of the DICOM image file which has been used

file.name: metaDataFileName
file.label: JSON metadata file
file.description: File names of the text files containing metadata attributes.

file.name: outputParaMapFileName
file.label: Parametric map file name
file.description: File name of the parametric map object that will keep the result.
